Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - Ensure ITP has been reviewed and signed off by the DM. No work may proceed unless this has been signed.

4 - Notice to Engineer Reviewed by Contract Manager
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - All NTE's to be reviewed
Frequency - Prior to submission to Engineer

Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - Markout existing aligment and trench edges onsite, to be confirmed by the Engineer's Rep

Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - Pipe to be laid as per specification, contract document and plans
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - Install as per construction plans
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - Compacted layers not exceeding 200mm or 1/3 the pipe OD (whichever is lesser).
